headline: Reassessing Northern Trust (NTRS) Valuation After A Period Of Strong Share Price Momentum
summary: Northern Trust (NTRS) has been drawing attention after recent trading left the shares at $146.17, inviting investors to reassess the US wealth and asset servicing group’s current valuation and fundamentals. See our latest analysis for Northern Trust. The recent move to $146.17 follows a period of firm share price momentum, with a 30-day share price return of 5.52% and a 12.54% 90-day share price return sitting alongside a 47.78% 1-year total shareholder return. This hints that sentiment has...
